alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 5:56AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northeastern Aitkin and southwestern St. Louis Counties through 630 AM CDT... At 556 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Swan River, or 19 miles southeast of Grand Rapids, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Toivola and Meadowlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
